aspguidp.gui.window

Class WindowSizeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidp.gui.window.WindowSizeManager

  • public class WindowSizeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class which provides methods to adjust the program window size to the current displayed content.

    The application dynamically adds and removes components from the displayed content (for example; when the logic program is executed, the application adds the logic program output component (ProgramOutputController) to the displayed content to present the results of the logic program).

    The methods of this class are used to adjust the size of the program window, after a component was added or removed from the displayed content of the window.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WindowSizeManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void adaptWindowSize()
      Adapt the size of the application window to match the preferred size of the window content.
      static void setPrimaryStage(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Set the primary stage of the application which represents the program window, of which the size is adjusted.
      static void setRootNode(javafx.scene.layout.VBox rootNode)
      Set the root node of the program window, which is used to calculate a suitable size for the program window.
      static void updateMinWindowSize()
      Set the min size of the application window to the min size of the window content, to prevent that parts of the window content are hidden because the window size is too small.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setPrimaryStage

        public static void setPrimaryStage(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Set the primary stage of the application which represents the program window, of which the size is adjusted.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - program window, of which the size is adjusted.

      • setRootNode

        public static void setRootNode(javafx.scene.layout.VBox rootNode)
        Set the root node of the program window, which is used to calculate a suitable size for the program window.
        Parameters:
        rootNode - node which is used to calculate a suitable size for the program window.

      • updateMinWindowSize

        public static void updateMinWindowSize()
        Set the min size of the application window to the min size of the window content, to prevent that parts of the window content are hidden because the window size is too small.

      • adaptWindowSize

        public static void adaptWindowSize()
        Adapt the size of the application window to match the preferred size of the window content. Additionally adapt the min size of the application window, so that the user cannot resize the window to a too small size.
